verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
When hard pressed I cried out to the Lord
And he brought me into a spacious place.
I will praise you for you answered me
And have become my salvation.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
I will not die but I will live,
And I will proclaim what the Lord has done.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
The stone the builders rejected
Has become the chief cornerstone.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
You are my God and I will praise you.
My God, I will exalt you
